name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub Pull Request Title Case Helper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for transforming GitHub pull request titles into their MLA-compliant title-cased equivalents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a simple button to the GitHub pull request web interface that will transform the currently-entered pull request title into its MLA-compliant title-cased equivalent.
